ul.li: Possible values on the "background" properties are the set of all possible values on the individual properties. (background-color || background-image || background-repeat || background- attachment || background-position)

body.p:
If statement above is passed, this page should have an oval button image on a gray background; the image should not be repeated, should be fixed, and should be centered at the top of this page. The rule applied is "body {background: gray url(ovalbbut.gif) no-repeat fixed top}".
All other properties of this page should be UA-default. aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
